grade_comment:
Grade: 95

Comment: The student provided an accurate and detailed explanation of the command Jesus gave to His disciples before ascending to heaven, quoting the relevant scripture from Matthew 28:18-20. They effectively captured the essence of the Great Commission in the context of discipleship, demonstrating a good understanding of the mission given to the disciples by Jesus. The only minor improvement could be to further elaborate on the significance of baptism in the process of disciple-making.
